title: Ticket #964: POST script terminated events not written to EventLog
description: The fix to gittrac #934 means that POST script terminated events will never be written to the event log (the only way they would have been written in the past was if the EventLog was writeable by the user who submitted DAGMan). I don't think this is too severe a problem, but something to keep in mind.
remarks:
2012-Feb-29 16:55:31 by tannenba:
not a problem... in fact, this behavior is preferred. abandoning ticket.
creator: wenger
